title: Personalizing Algebra Learning: Customized Instructional Design Using Intelligent Tutoring Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary algebra concepts (equations, functions, graphs, etc.)
context.additional_context: Learners require algebraic application skills linked to science-related job roles, solve personalized interest-based problems through ITS, and complete project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can solve personalized algebra problems linked to their daily interests (sports, games, etc.) with 80%+ accuracy
Learners understand the difference between deep/shallow personalized problems in ITS (Intelligent Tutoring Systems) and can select problems matching their quantitative engagement levels
Learners can apply algebraic concepts to solve real-life problems and submit project-based outcomes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
